DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness Epiduo® Gel reduce antibiotic sensitive resistant strain P acne vivo .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Effectiveness Epiduo® Gel Reducing Antibiotic Sensitive & Resistant Strains Propionibacterium ( P ) Acnes
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult male female subject 18 year age old , past present history significant internal disease Subjects : show high degree fluorescence facial skin Wood 's lamp , indicate presence P acnes Baseline P acnes count > 10,000 per cm2 CFU facial skin ( forehead ) high level resistance erythromycin , variable resistance clindamycin , resistance tetracycline variable resistance doxycycline minocycline Subjects exhibit skin disorder acute chronic nature ( e.g. , psoriasis , eczema , etc ) Subjects take topical systemic antibiotic within 4 week prior baseline assessment Subjects use medication may influence skin surface P acnes level Subjects unwilling refrain use toner , astringent dry agent face study
